item.title: SDM lectures
item.description: Struttura della Materia Info about the course Language: italian Professor: Giovanni Battista Bachelet University: “La Sapienza” Period: second semester of academic year 2019/2020 The course “Struttura della Materia” (Matter Structure) was held by professor Giovanni Battista Bachelet [] at Sapienza University, the notes have been taken during the second semester of academic year 2019/2020. Characteristics of the notes I took raw notes using Ipad pro, then they were fixed and written on paper The notes divided in 3 macro arguments: Atomic Physiscs Molecular Physics Solid state Physics In the future i will list notes based on smaller arguments.
